title: Skull Decal Pack
description: 50 skull-themed line art decals. Great for in-game corporate/company/squad logos.
longDescription:
50 skull themed line art decals. Great for in-game corporate/military logos. Using the vector

images in the Vector/ folder you can create textures at any resolution you prefer: 512x512, 1024x1024, 2K, 4K, 8K 32k!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Materials and Material Instances: 51
  •  2048x2048 texture files (customizable, see the Notes below)
  •  Vector (SVG format)

Number of Unique Materials and Material Instances: 51

Number of Textures: 50

Texture Resolutions: 2K, but you can use the vector images to make any resolution you need (see Notes below)


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Documentation

None


Important/Additional Notes: I used Inkscape, an open source program to create the vector images. It works on Windows, Mac and Linux. Simply open the decal you want (all are located in the Vectors/ folder of this project), go to the Export tab and set the resolution you need. Export as PNG or JPG, whichever one yields the smaller file size and then, in UE, duplicate any existing material instance and edit it to use your new texture!


Discord Channel

If you want to contact e with ideas for other assets packs you'd like to see, check out my discord at: https://discord.gg/VKc4vq4Eaf

Sychotic Ways created a Youtube video shoowing his usse of these decals in action, as tattoos here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3CSC0iNGJcM&t=36s
